home.intro: park.fan shows real-time wait times and crowd levels for over 150 theme parks and 5,000+ attractions worldwide—including Disney, Universal Studios, Europa-Park, and Phantasialand. Plan your visit with live queue times, opening hours, and AI-powered predictions.

sections.liveNowIntro: Theme parks and amusement parks by region with current open status and live wait times.
sections.featuresIntro: Use real-time wait times, crowd predictions, and park calendars to choose the best day and navigate queues at Disney, Universal, Europa-Park, and more.

realtime.description: Live wait times updated every minute from parks worldwide.

ml.description: Smart predictions for crowd levels and wait times using advanced artificial intelligence.

calendar.description: Find the best days with our crowd calendar and navigate the park live.

footer.description: Live wait times and AI-powered crowd predictions for 142+ theme parks worldwide. Plan your perfect park visit with real-time data and in-park navigation.
footer.keywords: theme park wait times, queue times, crowd predictions, ride availability, opening hours, amusement park, roller coaster, Disney wait times, Universal Studios, Europa-Park, Phantasialand, theme park calendar, best time to visit
footer.disclaimer: All information provided without warranty. The displayed wait times and status information are automatically provided and may differ from the actual situation on site.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.openingHoursQ: What are the opening hours for {park} today?
faq.diningQ: What dining options are available at {park}?
faq.crowdCalendarA: Yes! park.fan provides a detailed crowd calendar for {park} showing predicted crowd levels for the next 30 days, helping you choose the best days to visit with shorter wait times.

attraction.title: Frequently Asked Questions
attraction.waitTimeQ: How long is the wait for {attraction}?
attraction.waitTimeA: Wait times for {attraction} vary by day and season. Check live wait times on park.fan.
attraction.singleRiderQ: Does {attraction} have a Single Rider line?
attraction.singleRiderA: Yes, {attraction} has a Single Rider line for individual guests to fill empty seats.
attraction.paidQueueQ: Is there a fast pass options for {attraction}?
attraction.paidQueueA: Yes, expedited access is available via {type}.

faq.whatIsA: park.fan is your central platform for live wait times and current information from over 30 theme parks in Europe, Asia, and North America. We show you in real-time how long the wait times are at your favorite attractions, which shows are currently running, and when the parks are open.
faq.whichParksQ: Which theme parks are supported by park.fan?
faq.whichParksA: park.fan supports over 30 theme parks worldwide, including Phantasialand, Europa-Park, Disneyland Paris, Efteling, Walibi Belgium, Toverland, Bobbejaanland, and many more. You can find the complete list of all parks with live wait times on our parks overview page. We are continuously expanding our offering with additional theme parks.
faq.liveDataQ: Are the wait times on park.fan live and in real-time?
faq.liveDataA: Yes! park.fan continuously updates all wait times during park operating hours. The data comes directly from the official park APIs and is synchronized in real-time. You always see the most current available wait times and can optimally plan your park visit.
faq.freeA: Yes, park.fan is completely free to use. You can view all live wait times, opening hours, shows, and restaurants without registration or payment. Our goal is to provide the best possible service to every theme park visitor.
faq.favoritesQ: Can I save my favorite parks and attractions on park.fan?
faq.favoritesA: Yes! With park.fan's favorites feature, you can mark your favorite parks and favorite attractions. These will then be displayed on your personalized homepage, so you can immediately see the current wait times for your favorites.
faq.featuresQ: What information does park.fan offer besides live wait times?
faq.featuresA: In addition to live wait times for attractions, park.fan also provides park opening hours, show times, restaurant information, weather forecasts, historical wait time statistics, and crowd forecasts. This way, you can optimally plan your theme park visit and find the best times for your favorite attractions.
faq.mobileA: Absolutely! park.fan is fully responsive and works perfectly on smartphones and tablets. You can check live wait times directly in the theme park to spontaneously decide which attraction to visit next. The mobile version offers all features of the desktop version.
